member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.LabSystemWorkflowCapabilityInformation
member.summary: Provides the workflow capability information of a particular lab system.

Provides the workflow capability information of a particular lab system. Details include: 1. Name of the agent. 2. Labsystem on which it resides. 3. Status of the agent, this is defined by enum LabSystemCapabilityState 4. Status message of the agent if any.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.LabSystemWorkflowCapabilityInformation.BuildAgentName
member.summary: Gets the name of the build agent running on this lab system.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LabSystemWorkflowCapabilityInformation class. Parameterless constructor for deserialization

member.param: The uri of the labsystem whose workflow capbility information will be stored
The status of the build agent running on this lab system.
The name of the build agent running on this lab system.

member.summary: Returns the workflow capability information of lab system in string format.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.WorkflowCapabilityInformation
member.summary: Provides workflow capability information of a lab environment.

Provides workflow capability information of a lab environment. Details include: 1. Complete information of build controller using BuildController Object. 2. List of all agents with details using list of LabSystemsCapabilityInformation objects. 3. Capability Status, as defined by enum CapabilityState 4. Status message if any.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.WorkflowCapabilityInformation.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WorkflowCapabilityInformation class Parameterless constructor for deserialization

member.summary: Gets the name of the build controller with which this environment is configured with.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.WorkflowCapabilityInformation.ToString
member.summary: Returns the workflow capability information of an environment in string format.
member.returns: String having environment workflow capability information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.IWorkflowIntegrationService.GetCapabilityStatus(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets the status of workflow capability on a specified lab environment. Status of workflow capability is a cumulative status of controller and agents of lab environmnet.
member.exception: thrown if some error occured while processing request

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.IWorkflowIntegrationService.GetCapabilityInformation(System.Uri)
member.summary: Provides details about workflow capability on a specified lab environment. Details include: a. Status of capability. b. Details of build controller. c. Details of each agent like name, labsystem uri, status and any agent specific error. d. Errors if any at capability level.
member.exception: thrown if some error occured while processing request

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.IWorkflowIntegrationService.GetBuildController(System.Uri)
member.summary: Returns the controller name on which this lab environment is configured. If lab environment is not configured, then a null string is returned.
member.exception: thrown if some error occured while processing request

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.IWorkflowIntegrationService.SyncCapability(System.Uri,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Synchronizes the workflow capability of the lab environment. It is used to setup, update or teardown workflow capability on lab environment. Reserved property called Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Configure defines the workflow capability on lab environment. Reserved property Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.ExternalControllerUri defines lab environment association with a build controller.
member.param: Indicates whether to update only the credentials.
member.exception: thrown if object is locked for another operation
thrown if some error occured while processing request

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Client.IWorkflowIntegrationService.SyncCapability(System.Uri)
member.summary: Synchronizes the workflow capability of the lab environment. It is used to setup, update or teardown workflow capability on lab environment. Reserved property called Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.Configure defines the workflow capability on lab environment. Reserved property Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Lab.WorkflowIntegration.ExternalControllerUri defines lab environment association with a build controller.
member.exception: thrown if object is locked for another operation
thrown if some error occured while processing request

members.member: Returns a localized string given a resource string name.
Returns a localized integer given a resource string name.
Returns a localized string given a resource string name.

A little helper function to alleviate some typing associated with loading resources and formatting the strings. In DEBUG builds, it also asserts that the number of format arguments and the length of args match.
